alert.note: Alert for Darke; Mercer (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 27 at 6:13PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A SHOWER WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHWESTERN DARKE AND SOUTHWESTERN MERCER COUNTIES THROUGH 645 PM EDT... At 613 PM EDT, a shower was located near Fort Recovery, moving east at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds gusts up to 35 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Fort Recovery, Burkettsville, New Weston, and North Dayton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...35 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. Residents in these areas should remain alert. If this shower becomes stronger, then a warning may be needed. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
